dataQuery.sqlStatement: select stg.pan "PAN", ppa.segment1 "PROJECT_NUMBER", SUBSTR(ppa.start_date,1,10) "START_DATE", SUBSTR(ppa.completion_date,1,10) "COMPLETION_DATE", ppa.name "PROJECT_NAME", ppa.long_name "LONG_NAME", ppa.description "DESCRIPTION", (select hre.employee_num from hr_employees hre, pa_project_players ppp where ppp.person_id=hre.employee_id and ppp.project_role_type='PROJECT MANAGER' and stg.project_manager=hre.employee_num and ppp.project_id=ppa.project_id) "PROJECT_MANAGER", (select name from pa_projects_all where project_id=ppa.created_from_project_id) "TEMPLATE_NAME", ppa.attribute1 "PROJECT_LOCATION", (select name from hr_all_organization_units where organization_id=ppa.carrying_out_organization_id) "PROJECT_ORG", (select pbl.raw_cost from pa_budget_versions pbv, pa_budget_lines pbl, pa_resource_assignments pra, pa_tasks pt where pbl.budget_version_id=pbv.budget_version_id and pbv.project_id=ppa.project_id and pbv.current_flag='Y' and pbv.project_id=pt.project_id and pra.budget_version_id=pbv.budget_version_id and pra.task_id=pt.task_id and pt.task_name = 'Capital Expenditures' and pbl.resource_assignment_id=pra.resource_assignment_id) "CAPITAL_BUDGET", (select pbl.raw_cost from pa_budget_versions pbv, pa_budget_lines pbl, pa_resource_assignments pra, pa_tasks pt where pbl.budget_version_id=pbv.budget_version_id and pbv.project_id=ppa.project_id and pbv.current_flag='Y' and pbv.project_id=pt.project_id and pra.budget_version_id=pbv.budget_version_id and pra.task_id=pt.task_id and pt.task_name = 'Non-Cap Expenditures' and pbl.resource_assignment_id=pra.resource_assignment_id) "EXPENSE_BUDGET", (select ftl.territory_short_name from hr_all_organization_units haou, hr_operating_units hou, gl_sets_of_books gsob, fnd_currencies fc, fnd_territories_tl ftl where haou.organization_id=ppa.org_id and haou.name=hou.name and hou.set_of_books_id=gsob.set_of_books_id and gsob.currency_code=fc.currency_code and fc.issuing_territory_code=ftl.territory_code) "COUNTRY", (select fc.currency_code from hr_all_organization_units haou, hr_operating_units hou, gl_sets_of_books gsob, fnd_currencies fc, fnd_territories_tl ftl where haou.organization_id=ppa.org_id and haou.name=hou.name and hou.set_of_books_id=gsob.set_of_books_id and gsob.currency_code=fc.currency_code and fc.issuing_territory_code=ftl.territory_code) "CURRENCY_CODE", stg.status_code "COMPLETION_STATUS", stg.status_mesg "STATUS_MESG", FND_GLOBAL.CONC_REQUEST_ID "REQUEST_ID" FROM pa_projects_all ppa, xx_pa_bulk_create_prj_stg stg where stg.project_number=ppa.segment1 and stg.status IN ('P','IC') union select stg.pan PAN, stg.project_extension "PROJECT_NUMBER", SUBSTR(stg.project_start_date,1,10) "START_DATE", SUBSTR(stg.project_end_date,1,10) "COMPLETION_DATE", stg.project_name "PROJECT_NAME", stg.project_long_name "LONG_NAME", stg.project_description||''||stg.add_to_desc "DESCRIPTION", stg.project_manager "PROJECT_MANAGER", stg.template_name "TEMPLATE_NAME", stg.project_location "PROJECT_LOCATION", stg.project_org "PROJECT_ORG", stg.capital_budget "CAPITAL_BUDGET", stg.expense_budget "EXPENSE_BUDGET", stg.country "COUNTRY", stg.currency_code "CURRENCY_CODE", stg.status_code "COMPLETION_STATUS", stg.status_mesg "STATUS_MESG", FND_GLOBAL.CONC_REQUEST_ID "REQUEST_ID" FROM xx_pa_bulk_create_prj_stg stg where stg.status='E'
